Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Top-level package for machine-learning.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassificationEvent
    A single classification event in a training or test corpus, combining the results of feature tests and the correct classification.
    ClassificationEventStream
    An interface for reading corpus classification events from a training or test corpus.
    ClassificationModel
    A machine learning model for classification.
    ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains a machine learning classification model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    ClassificationMultiModelTrainer
    Trains multiple models instead of a single model.
    ClassificationObserver
    Makes it possible to observe the decision making procedure for a given analyser.
    ClassificationSolution
    A solution to a particular classification problem.
    Decision
    A single probabilised decision used to construct a particular solution.
    DecisionMaker
    Makes probabilised decisions based on feature results.
    ExternalResource<T>
    An external resource which returns something (T) matching a list of key elements.
    ExternalResourceFinder
    Finds the external resource corresponding to a given name.
    ExternalWordList
    A word-list stored in an external resource.
    FeatureWeightVector
    In global learning systems, stores the weight associated with each feature
    MachineLearningModel
    A machine learning model, capable of providing a DecisionMaker, and encapsluating all of the information required to analyse mew data (e.g.
    MachineLearningService
    A service for retrieving implementations of the machineLearning package.
    Ranker<T>
    An algorithm which, given an input, will produce a set of ranked outputs in the form of feature results.
    RankingEvent<T>
    A single classification event in a training or test corpus, combining the results of feature tests and the correct classification.
    RankingEventStream<T>
    An interface for reading corpus ranking events from a training or test corpus.
    RankingModel
    A machine learning model used for solution ranking.
    RankingModelTrainer<T>
    Trains a machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    RankingSolution
    The solution to an incremental ranking problem.
    ScoringStrategy<T extends Solution>
    A strategy for scoring a given solution, in view of the decisions made and the underlying solutions.
    Solution  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMachineLearningModel
    An abstract superclass for machine-learning models.
    AdditiveScoringStrategy
    For perceptrons and other additive score methods.
    GeometricMeanScoringStrategy
    Takes the geometric mean of the individual decision scores, and multiplies it by the scores of underlying solutions.
    MachineLearningServiceLocator  
    MachineLearningSession
    A class storing session-wide reference data.
    OutcomeEqualiserEventStream
    An event stream that guarantees that no outcome will appear more than n times more than the minimum outcome.
    SimpleRankingScoringStrategy
    Returns the ranking score previously assigned without further manipulation.
    SparseStringMatrixResource
    A sparse matrix indexed by Strings for both rows and columns, and containing double values.
    TextFileMultivaluedResource
    An external resource read from a text file.
    The default name will be the filename.
    If a line starts with the string "Name: ", the default name will be replaced by this name.
    If a line starts with the string "Multivalued: false", an exception gets thrown.
    All lines starting with # are skipped.
    Any other line will be broken up by tabs:
    For multi-valued resources, the second-to-last tab is the class, the last tab is the weight.
    All previous tabs are considered to be key components.
    The same set of key components can have multiple classes with different weights.
    TextFileResource
    An external resource read from a text file.
    The default name will be the filename.
    If a line starts with the string "Name: ", the default name will be replaced by this name.
    If a line starts with the string "Multivalued: true", an exception gets thrown.
    All lines starting with # are skipped.
    Any other line will be broken up by tabs:
    One tab per key component, and the last tab is the class.
    TextFileWordList
    An external word list read from a text file.
    The first line must be "Type: WordList", otherwise an exception gets thrown.
    The default name will be the filename.
    If a line starts with the string "Name: ", the default name will be replaced by this name.
    All lines starting with # are skipped.
    All other lines contain words.
    TrainingParameters
    A class storing everything required to run a machine learning training session.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MachineLearningAlgorithm
    Machine learning algorithms supported by Talimane.
    MachineLearningModel.MachineLearningModelType  

Package com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning Description

Top-level package for machine-learning. The central interface is the MachineLearningModel, usually a ClassificationModel trained using a ClassificationModelTrainer, based on a ClassificationEventStream which consists of a stream of ClassificationEvent.
This model provides a DecisionMaker capable of returning a list of Decision ordered by descending probability.
